segments.text: You have done an excellent job this year and we are pleased with the results .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am glad that you have been happy with my performance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As a result of your performance , we are happy to offer you the position of manager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does this title come with an increase in salary ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you give me the specifics ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your monthly gross salary will increase by $ 500 .
segments.speaker: S1
